page.title: 18BARBARAFIELD
page.content: {Barbarafield Riding School}has been open 25 years and is a family business. {There are 27 horses and 3 {members of staff.}They teach complete beginners to experienced riders although the minimum age is 5.They are taught to ride,jump and look after the horses.Barbarafield is open all year round but is busiest in summer.{ {Lessons cost Â£3 per hour. {CUPAR GOLF CLUB} {Cupar Golf Club is the 3rd oldest 9 {hole course in Britain and was {established in 1855.}It has{444 members.It costs{Â£44 for}an adult {membership,Â£12 for juniors and Â£9 for {OAP's.The visitors fee for a round is {Â£3.}One problem is part of the course is on a hill and is hard to keep watered.One day the club hope to extend the course to 18 holes but they would have to buy more land.
